Order ID: {{1.`0`}}

‚è±Ô∏è Status: Packed

Order is packed but not yet dispatched.
Please prepare for immediate handover to delivery.

Next escalation at: 20 minutes

mapper.content:
üü† Packing SLA ‚Äì Dispatch Delayed

Order ID: {{1.`0`}}

‚è±Ô∏è Status: Packed
‚è≥ Time since packing: 20 minutes

Dispatch delay detected.
This may impact delivery timelines.

@DispatchTeam please assign a rider immediately.

Next escalation at: 30 minutes (Critical)

Delivery SLA is now at risk.

@DispatchTeam @OpsLead urgent action required.

Order ID: {{1.`0`}}
Delivery Address: {{1.`5`}}

‚è±Ô∏è Status: Out for Delivery
‚è≥ Time on route: 60 minutes

Delivery is taking longer than expected.
Please monitor rider progress.

Next escalation at: 120 minutes
